entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023
